// xMin : 0,
// xMax : 0,
// yMin : 0,
// yMax : 0,

// };



var dateArr = [];
var yAxisArr = [];
woundSummaryGraphData.woundData.forEach(function(d, i) {
console.log("1d ::::"+i+":"+JSON.stringify(d));

d.woundSummaryList.forEach(function(d1, i1){
console.log("1d1 ::::"+i1+":"+JSON.stringify(d1));
d1.y = d1.areaOfWound;
d1.x = new Date(d1.encounterDate);
});


console.log("2d ::::"+i+":"+JSON.stringify(d));
//var tempDates = [];
dateArr.push(new Date(Math.min.apply(Math,d.woundSummaryList.map(function(o){return o.x;}))));
dateArr.push(new Date(Math.max.apply(Math,d.woundSummaryList.map(function(o){return o.x;}))));


yAxisArr.push(Math.min.apply(Math,d.woundSummaryList.map(function(o){return o.y;})));
yAxisArr.push(Math.max.apply(Math,d.woundSummaryList.map(function(o){return o.y;})));


//dateArr.push(tempDates);
});
console.log(JSON.stringify(dateArr));
console.log(JSON.stringify(yAxisArr));
//return new Date(Math.max.apply(Math,data.map(function(o){return o.x;})));

var minDate = Math.min.apply(Math,dateArr.map(function(o){return new Date(o);}));
console.log("minDate:::"+new Date(minDate));

var maxDate = Math.max.apply(Math,dateArr.map(function(o){return new Date(o);}))
console.log("maxDate:::"+new Date(maxDate));

var yMin = Math.min.apply(Math,yAxisArr.map(function(o){return o;}));
console.log("yMin:::"+yMin);

var yMax = Math.max.apply(Math,yAxisArr.map(function(o){return o;}))
console.log("yMax:::"+yMax);

var xAxisTickSize = 8;
var extraX = ((maxDate-minDate)/(24*60*60*1000));
if(parseInt(extraX/7) > 1 ){
   // alert("inside xPadding:::"+parseInt(extraX/7))
    
    minDate = new Date(minDate - 7*24*60*60*1000);
    maxDate = new Date(maxDate + 7*24*60*60*1000);
    //minDate = woundSummaryGraphData.xMin;
    //maxDate = woundSummaryGraphData.xMax
    xAxisTickSize = 8
}

var extraY = parseInt((yMax - yMin)/10);

woundSummaryGraphData.xMin = new Date(minDate);
woundSummaryGraphData.xMax = new Date(maxDate);
woundSummaryGraphData.yMin = parseInt(yMin-extraY);
woundSummaryGraphData.yMax = parseInt(yMax+extraY);

var woundData = woundSummaryGraphData.woundData;


var mindate = woundSummaryGraphData.xMin; //new Date("07/01/2016"),
maxdate = woundSummaryGraphData.xMax; //new Date("07/18/2016");

var ymin = woundSummaryGraphData.yMin; //-10;
var ymax = woundSummaryGraphData.yMax; //50;

var fontSize = '16px';
var fontName = 'calibri';

var areaVolumeMeasure = "-cm2";


// chart data
var chartConfig = {
lineConnectorLength:40,
axisLabel:{
xAxis : 'Patient Visit Date',
yAxis : 'Wound ',
},
lineLabel:{
height:20,
width:60,
},

};

// enviornment setup
var svgConfig = {
id:"mySvg",
width:820,
height:420,
padding: 60,
margin : {
top: 20,
right: 20,
bottom: 20,
left: 40
}
};

// Define the div for the tooltip
var tooltipDiv = d3.select("body").append("div").attr("class", "tooltip")
.style("position", "absolute")
.style("text-align", "left")
.style("padding", "8px")
.style("font", "15px calibri")
.style("border-radius", "8px")
.style("pointer-events", "none");

// drawing
// append svg element
var bodySelection = d3.select("body"); //body
d3.select("svg").remove();
var svgSelection  = bodySelection.append("svg")
.attr("id", svgConfig.id)
.attr("width",svgConfig.width)
.attr("height",svgConfig.height)
.style("margin-top",  svgConfig.top)
.style("margin-left", svgConfig.left)

// create x scale
xScale = d3.time.scale().range([
                                svgConfig.margin.left,
                                svgConfig.width - svgConfig.margin.right/2
                                ]).domain(//[d3.min(chartConfig.data, function(d) {return +d.year;}),//d3.max(chartConfig.data, function(d) {return +d.year;})]
                                          [mindate, maxdate]
                                          );
                                          
                                          // create y scale
                                          yScale = d3.scale.linear().range(
                                                                           [svgConfig.height - svgConfig.padding,
                                                                            svgConfig.margin.bottom])
                                                                            .domain([ymin,ymax]);
                                                                            
                                                                            //let's create the axes using the scales
                                                                            xAxis = d3.svg.axis().scale(xScale).ticks(xAxisTickSize)
                                                                            .tickFormat(d3.time.format("%m/%d/%y")).innerTickSize(-(svgConfig.height-svgConfig.padding));
                                                                            
                                                                            yAxis = d3.svg.axis()
                                                                            .orient("left")
                                                                            .scale(yScale)
                                                                            .innerTickSize(-(svgConfig.width-svgConfig.padding));
                                                                            
                                                                            // add xaxis to chart - it will add it to top of the svg
                                                                            svgSelection.append("svg:g")
                                                                            .attr("id","xAxis")
                                                                            .call(xAxis)
                                                                            .style("fill", "none")
                                                                            .style("stroke","#aaa") //#777
                                                                            .style("shape-rendering","crispEdges");
                                                                            
                                                                            // The X axis is drawn but First, we need to position it vertically downwards using transform property
                                                                            d3.select("#xAxis").attr("transform", "translate(0," + (svgConfig.height - svgConfig.margin.bottom-svgConfig.margin.top) + ")")
                                                                            .selectAll("text")
                                                                            .attr("x", 0)
                                                                            .attr("y", 0)
                                                                            .attr("dy", "1.25em")
                                                                            .attr("transform", "rotate(0)")  //-30
                                                                            .attr("font-size","10px")
                                                                            .attr("font-family",fontName)
                                                                            .style("stroke", "#555")
                                                                            
                                                                            
                                                                            /*.selectAll("text")  
                                                                             .style("text-anchor", "before-edge")
                                                                             .attr("dx", "-.8em")
                                                                             .attr("dy", ".15em")
                                                                             .attr("transform", "rotate(-25)");
                                                                             //.attr("transform", "translate(0," + (svgConfig.height - svgConfig.margin.bottom) + ")");
                                                                             */
    // give label to xaxis
    svgSelection.append('text')
    .attr('text-anchor','bottom')
    .attr('font-family',fontName)
    .attr('font-size',fontSize)
    .attr('font-weight', 'bold')
    .attr('fill','#555')
    .attr("transform", "translate("+ (svgConfig.width/2) +","+(svgConfig.height)+")")
    .text(chartConfig.axisLabel.xAxis);
    
    
    // add yaxis to chart, but this will not add it to correct oorientation
    svgSelection.append("svg:g")
    .attr("id","yAxis")
    .call(yAxis)
    .style("fill", "none")
    .style("stroke","#ccc")
    .style("shape-rendering","crispEdges");
    
    svgSelection.append('text')
    .attr('text-anchor','middle')
    .attr('font-family',fontName)
    .attr('font-size',fontSize)
    .attr('font-weight', 'bold')
    .attr('fill','#444')
    .attr("transform", "translate(0,"+(svgConfig.height/2)+")rotate(-90)")
    .text(chartConfig.axisLabel.yAxis);
    
    // apply transform logic to bring it to correct place
    d3.select("#yAxis")
    .attr("transform", "translate(" + (svgConfig.margin.left) + ",0)")
    .selectAll("text")
    .attr("font-size","10px")
    .attr("font-family",fontName)
    .style("stroke", "#555")
    
    // now lets generate line
    var lineSelection = d3.svg.line()
    .x(function(d){
       return xScale(d.x);
       })
       .y(function(d){
          return yScale(d.y)
          });
var marginLegend = 0; // this can be dynamic later and no need to call create legend per line

console.log("woundData length:::"+woundData.length);
console.log("woundsSelected:::"+woundsSelected);

woundData.forEach(function(d, i) {
var line = 'line'+(i+1);
var woundItem = woundData[i];

console.log("iteration:"+i+"&&colors[i]"+woundSummaryGraphData.colors[woundsSelected[i]-1]+"&&"+JSON.stringify(woundData[i]));
var lineItem = drawLine(woundItem, woundSummaryGraphData.colors[woundsSelected[i]-1],woundItem.woundLabel, line)
drawPoints(woundItem, woundSummaryGraphData.colors[woundsSelected[i]-1], lineItem);
//createLegend(colors[i], line, woundItem.name);
maxLineItem = i;
});


// method to create legend
function createLegend(legendColor,lineId,legendText){

var legendGroup = svgSelection.append("g");

legendGroup.append("rect")
.attr("width", chartConfig.lineLabel.width+5)
.attr("height", chartConfig.lineLabel.height)
.attr("x", (svgConfig.width + marginLegend - 45)/1.3)
.attr("y",(svgConfig.margin.top-15))
.attr("stroke", legendColor)
.attr("fill", legendColor)
.attr("stroke-width", 1).style("opacity", 0).transition()
.duration(600)
.style("opacity", 1)


legendGroup.append('text')
.attr('text-anchor','middle')
.attr('font-family','sans-serif')
.style('cursor','pointer')
.attr('font-size','12px')
.attr('fill','white')
.attr("transform", "translate("+ ((svgConfig.width + marginLegend)/1.3) + ","+(svgConfig.margin.top)+")")
.text("X  "+legendText)
.on("click", function(){
var opacity = d3.select("."+lineId).style("opacity")==1 ? 0 : 1;
d3.select("."+lineId)
.transition()
.duration(500)
.style("opacity", opacity)
});
marginLegend+=100;
}

function drawPoints(pointData, pointColor, onLine){
// create points for line

//console.log('drawPoints Wound: '+pointData.name);

onLine.selectAll(".points")
.data(pointData.woundSummaryList)
.enter().append("svg:circle")
.style("cursor","pointer")
.attr("stroke", pointColor)
.attr("fill", function(d, i) { return pointColor })
.attr("cx", function(d, i) { return xScale(d.x) })
.attr("cy", function(d, i) { return yScale(d.y) })
.attr("r", function(d, i) { return 3 })
.on("mouseover", function(d) {
//console.log("point mouseover::::"+JSON.stringify(d))
// animate point useful when we have points ploted close to each other.
d3.select(this)
.transition()
.duration(300)
.attr("r", 6);

// code block for tooltip
tooltipDiv.transition()
.duration(200)
.style("opacity", .9);


var woundInfoToolTip = "<b>Wound: </b>"+pointData.woundLabel
    + '<br/>Encounter Date:<b> '+d.encounterDate
        //+ '</b><br/>Encounter Id:<b> ' + d.encounterId;
            
            var ptXdeduct = 60;
            var ptYdeduct = 50

                    if(d.areaPercentageOfHealing != null){
                    woundInfoToolTip = woundInfoToolTip + '<br/>%Area Healed :<b> ' + d.areaPercentageOfHealing
                        }
                            
    
                            if(d.biopsy != null && "yes" == d.biopsy.toLowerCase()){
                            woundInfoToolTip = woundInfoToolTip + '</b><font size="16px">Biopsy</font><b>'
                                ptYdeduct = ptYdeduct + 20;
                            }
                            if(d.debridement != null && "yes" == d.debridement.toLowerCase()){
                            woundInfoToolTip = woundInfoToolTip + '</b><br/>Debridement<b>'
                                ptYdeduct = ptYdeduct + 20;
                            }
                            if(d.comprehensiveTreatment != null && "yes" == d.comprehensiveTreatment.toLowerCase()){
                            woundInfoToolTip = woundInfoToolTip + '</b><br/>Comprehensive Treatment<b>'
                                ptYdeduct = ptYdeduct + 20;
                            }
                            if(d.ionisionAndDriange  != null  && "yes" == d.ionisionAndDriange.toLowerCase()){
                            woundInfoToolTip = woundInfoToolTip + '</b><br/>Incision & Drainage,<b>'
                                ptYdeduct = ptYdeduct + 20;
                            }
                            if(d.negPressureWoundTherapy != null && "yes" == d.negPressureWoundTherapy.toLowerCase()){
                            woundInfoToolTip = woundInfoToolTip + '</b><br/>Negative Pressure Wound Therapy<b>'
                                ptYdeduct = ptYdeduct + 20;
                            }
                            if(d.totalContactCost != null && "yes" == d.totalContactCost.toLowerCase()){
                            woundInfoToolTip = woundInfoToolTip + '</b><br/>Total Contact Cast<b>'
                                ptYdeduct = ptYdeduct + 20;
                            }
    
                            console.log("Mouse COORDINATES drwa point1:::"+JSON.stringify(d3.mouse(this)));
                            console.log("Mouse ptXdeduct:::"+ptXdeduct);
                            //console.log("Mouse COORDINATES draw point:::"+d3.event.pageX+"|"+d3.event.pageY);
                            
                            
                            var pointX = parseInt(d3.mouse(this)[0]);
                            var pointY = parseInt(d3.mouse(this)[1]);
                            console.log("Mouse COORDINATES draw pointcsdfsd2:::"+pointX+"|"+pointY);
    
    
                            var topBottom = "top";
                            var leftRight = "left";
    
    if(pointY > 200){
    pointY = pointY - ptYdeduct;
    //topBottom = "bottom";
    }
    
    if(pointX > 700){
    pointX = pointX - 150;
    }
    
    
                                tooltipDiv.html(
                                "<p align='left'>"
                                + "<b>Wound: </b>Wound 2<br/><b>Encounter Date:</b> 03/28/16<br/><b>%Volume Healed :</b> 27%"
                                + '</p>'
                                )
                                .style("background", pointColor)
                                .style(leftRight, (pointX+10) + "px")
                                .style(topBottom, (pointY) + "px")
                                //.style("left", (d3.event.pageX-60) + "px")
                                //.style("top", (d3.event.pageY-220) + "px");
                                })
                                
                                .on("mouseout", function(d) {
                                
                                // animate point back to origional style
                                d3.select(this)
                                .transition()
                                .duration(300)
                                .attr("r", 3);
                                
                                tooltipDiv.transition()
                                .duration(500)
                                .style("opacity", 0);
                                
                                });
                                
                                
                                }

                                var group = svgSelection.append("g")

                                group.append("svg:path")
                                .attr('d', lineSelection(lineData.woundSummaryList))

                                .attr('stroke-width', 2)
                                .attr('fill', 'none')

                                return group;

     }</script>
